meanings.definition: Take delight or pleasure in (a particular thing)
meanings.sent1: She enjoys reading books in the cozy corner of her room.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys playing with his favorite toy car every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat enjoys pretending to be a fierce lion during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower enjoys basking in the warm sunlight all day long.
meanings.sent5: The child enjoys giggling uncontrollably when tickled by their parent.

meanings.definition: Have the benefit of; have the use or advantage of
meanings.sent1: The students enjoy the new library books for their research projects.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the convenience of having a bus stop right outside her house.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel enjoys the safety of its cozy nest high up in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The athlete enjoys the speed of the new racing bike during competitions.
meanings.sent5: He enjoys the taste of the freshly baked cookies his grandma makes.
